name: Grave Encounter
description:
This Halloween your grandmother has asked you to venture into an old graveyard to pay respects to your deceased family members by lighting the candles at their graves. Grandma's directions aren't the best, so you may need to hunt around to find the right tombstones. Oh, and you procrastinated so long it's now dark...

Find the graves of the Leeds family, light their candles, and get out before something gets you! 

This game was built start to finish in a week, and it shows in some places.  I had fun making it, and I hope you have fun playing it!
